item.title: Trump Calls for Sen. Schiff to Be Jailed
item.description: President Donald Trump has escalated his attacks on Sen. Adam Schiff, calling on the California Democrat to go to prison in a post on Truth Social.

item.title: In-N-Out Headquarters Leaving California
item.description: A fast-food hamburger chain long associated with California is moving its headquarters out of the Democrat-led state, according to its owner.
